title: A Randomized Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled  Study of ULC-345 (TNF inhibitor) in Patients With HIV Infection
officialTitle: A Randomized Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled  Study of ULC-345 (TNF inhibitor) in Patients With HIV Infection
description: This is a randomized double-blind, placebo-controlled  study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of ULC-345 (TNF inhibitor) in patients with HIV Infection. The study will enroll approximately 339 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 25-57 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of HIV Infection
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
